posts.message: Any one here is using LESS to write CSS? Look at the provided example and its compiled version in the "Getting started", try to make sense of it, then tell me WHY the hell are you using it? #LetsTakeABeautifulSimpleLanguageAndMakeItUgly
posts.caption: lesscss.org
posts.description: Less extends CSS with dynamic behavior such as variables, mixins, operations and functions. Less runs on both the server-side (with Node.js and Rhino) or client-side (modern browsers only).

posts.message:
How much should I ask as a freelance for a .net website with 75% static content, 25% dynamic, and about 6 to 9 pages?
It's here in Egypt! and It's the first time working on a freelance website like that so I don't know how to quote it.
